title: Golgappa Seller
growth: Can expand into a food stall or small restaurant
description: Prepares and sells golgappa/pani puri to customers in high-traffic areas.

title: Makeup Artist
growth: Can open salon or become celebrity makeup artist
description: Provides beauty and styling services for weddings, shoots, and events.

title: Street Food Seller
growth: Can expand into franchise or restaurant
description: Sells snacks or meals in public spaces, attracting customers with taste and price.

title: Data Analyst
growth: Can grow into Data Scientist or Analytics Manager
description: Analyzes data to provide insights that help businesses make decisions.

title: Carpenter
growth: Can open furniture business or interior services
description: Builds and repairs wooden furniture and structures with craftsmanship.

title: Rickshaw Driver
growth: Can own multiple vehicles or move into transport services
description: Provides short-distance transport for passengers, often in busy city areas.

title: Freelance Graphic Designer
growth: Can build design agency or become art director
description: Designs logos, graphics, and visuals for clients on a freelance basis.

title: School Student YouTuber
qualification: Basic video editing and content knowledge
growth: Can become influencer or full-time content creator
description: Students create videos on topics like education, gaming, or hobbies for YouTube.

title: Mechanic
growth: Can open own workshop or garage
description: Repairs and maintains vehicles, machines, or equipment.

title: Homemaker Baker
qualification: No formal degree, self-taught or short courses
growth: Can start cloud kitchen or bakery shop
description: Homemakers who bake cakes, cookies, or snacks and sell them locally or online.
